data.message: im sorry that im writing here, but i have questions about renaming (the same attitude with a different name) my page on the other hand i cant find any way to contact with you. so please get in touch with me! thanks in advance!

replies.message: Hey Mark. Learn how to change your page name in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1FwL5SL. -Sarah

i have read that. but it has more than 1000+ likes. furthermore i can not see the request change button. (but I'm the owner of the page as my friend - none of us can see it) this is why i want you to get in touch with me somehow please
You can change that in the settings of the page. You can everytime change the name.
